description: This Dart source file defines the AuthProvider class, a ChangeNotifier that manages authentication state, including login, auto-login, registration, and logout functionalities for a Flutter application.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that provides authentication state and operations such as login, auto-login, registration, and logout for Flutter apps.

methods.name: tryAutoLogin
methods.description: Attempts to automatically log in the user by reading a saved token and fetching the user profile.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs login with email and password, retrieves user profile, and sets authentication state.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and optional full name, returning the user profile.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears authentication tokens and disconnects notifications to log the user out.
